content.raw:
I'm having the same problem.  It appears that the docker container on the sim computer is just not starting.  Sad waste of two hours :(

Noticed in the error message that GoRobotGo posted there is a space after home/ in the invalid volume specification:

invalid volume specification: '/home/ ubuntu

Could that be the problem?
